summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless regarding an issue with their TV, where the picture quality was terrible and the sound was distorted. The agent provided instructions on how to perform a factory reset on the TV to see if this would help resolve any technical issues that may be causing the problem. The customer thanked the agent for their help and was given assurance that Contoso Wireless values their satisfaction and will do their best to make sure the issue is resolved quickly.
